level.text: All information, records, and data collected and maintained by the fee-for-service primary care provider that relate to enrollees shall be protected from unauthorized disclosure by the fee-for-service provider.

Except as otherwise provided by federal law or regulation, the use or disclosure of information concerning enrollees shall be restricted to purposes directly related to the administration of the Medicaid program in accordance with 42 C.F.R. ยง431.302.
The information to be safeguarded shall include all information listed in 42 C.F.R. ยง431.305.
